title: Health and Medical Treatment
list: I wanted to get a medical checkup.
The nurse is taking my blood pressure.
I had my stomach examined by an endoscope.
I have just received the test results.
The results showed that I had several health problems.
I had to undergo further tests.
The doctor advised me to start exercising.
I filled out the medical checkup questionnaire.
My blood pressure is a bit high.
You need to take some medicine and rest in bed.
The cold medicine made me sleepy.
This is to keep the fever down.
I'm afraid I've got a temperature.
Let me take your temperature first.
Please put this thermometer under your armpit.
It looks as if it's scarlet fever.
I've got a splitting headache and I feel very exhausted.
If I have a headache, I will take an aspirin.
There is a throbbing pain in my temples.
Don't just try to put up with your toothache, go and see the dentist.
It is hard to stand the pangs of a toothache.
I couldn't sleep well with my toothache.
Nothing works with my toothache now.
My toothache is killing me. I can't stand it.
Does it hurt to have it taken out?
My first tooth on the right hurts.
I think one of the back ones at the top is having most of trouble.
I feel pain here whenever I drink something cold.
I think you need a shot to deaden the pain first.
Does it hurt when I press here?
I have a gripping pain in the abdomen.
I have a pain in the lower abdomen.
I have a pain in my side.
It's not a sharp pain, just sort of a dull ache.
Why do you have black eyes?
I lie awake all night long.
Have you tried some sleeping pills?
I can't seem to stay awake.
The whole night I was light headed and half asleep.
Do you sleep well last night?
It must be an allergy. Do you have any aspirin?
Are you allergic to any medication?
Can you tell me some symptoms of the sub health?
Do you know how to prevent it?
Subhealth also called the third state or gray state.
Most of us are sub health.
Do we need pay some attention to diet?
Sub health is a borderline state between health and disease.
The doctors say that people should eat less salt and sugar and eat more vegetables and fruits.
I'm starting to have weak vision.
There is something wrong with my eyes.
I lost my appetite a week ago.
I don't feel like eating anything.
I don't want to eat anything. I'm nauseating.
I have been vomiting all night.
I vomited all the food I had eaten.
Vomiting also occurs in most patients.
The doctor said that I needed to have my tonsils taken out in an operation.
You must be hospitalized right now.
You'll have to be operated on for appendicitis.
I'm afraid you will have to be operated on.
